name: Karel Zimmermann
content: Karel ZimmermannSearch this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationAbout meAssociate professor at the Czech Technical University in PragueCo-leader of DARPA SubT challenge team (1x silver medal, 2x bronze medal)Co-founder of the Center for Robotics and Autonomous SystemsCurrent Google Scholar H-index 18, WoS H-index 13ORCID: https://orcid.org/0000-0002-8898-4512ResearcherID: G-7963-2014, AAF-1596-2021Postdoctoral researcher with the Katholieke Universiteit Leuven (2008-2009) in the prof Luc van Gool group.The current research focused on explainable self-supervised perception for robotics.Videos from our robotics adventures and researchGoogle SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
